abilities: Meso Obtained +15% (For Training if +1 Passive Skills is 1st Line)

build: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/leap-up.png} tip={Leap Up}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/jump-for-joy.png} tip={Jump For Joy!}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/peerless-mountain.png} tip={Peerless Mountain}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/response.png} tip={Response}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/mountain-kid.png} tip={Mountain Kid}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/essence-sprinkle.png} tip={Essence Sprinkle}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Fortune Fitness}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/wand-mastery.png} tip={Wand Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/wand-booster.png} tip={Wand Booster}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/mountain-seeds.png} tip={Mountain Seeds}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/eruption-heaving-river.png} tip={Eruption: Heaving River}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/eruption-whirlwind.png} tip={Eruption: Whirlwind}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/eruption-sunrise-well.png} tip={Eruption: Sunrise Well}>

<tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/geomancy.png} tip={Geomancy}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/dragon-vein-traces.png} tip={Dragon Vein Traces}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/dragon-vein-echo.png} tip={Dragon Vein Echo}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/immaculate-thought.png} tip={Immaculate Thought}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/wakeup-call.png} tip={Wakeup Call}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/manifestation-sunlight-filled-ground.png} tip={Manifestation: Sunlight-Filled Ground}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/manifestation-wind-swing.png} tip={Manifestation: Wind Swing}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/manifestation-where-the-river-courses.png} tip={Manifestation: Where the River Courses}>

<tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/nature-master.png} tip={Nature Master}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/best-friend.png} tip={Best Friend}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/in-depth-geomancy.png} tip={In-depth Geomancy}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/insight.png} tip={Insight}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/advanced-wand-mastery.png} tip={Advanced Wand Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/relaxation.png} tip={Relaxation}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/anima-warrior.png} tip={Anima Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/absorption-sunlit-grain.png} tip={Absorption: Sunlit Grain}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/absorption-fierce-wind.png} tip={Absorption: Fierce Wind}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/absorption-river-puddle-douse.png} tip={Absorption: River Puddle Douse}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/anima-heros-will.png} tip={Anima Hero's Will}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/mountain-embrace.png} tip={Mountain Embrace}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/eruption-absorption-guardbreak.png} tip={Eruption Absorption Guardbreak}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/eruption-absorption-reinforce.png} tip={Eruption Absorption - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/eruption-absorption-boss-rush.png} tip={Eruption Absorption Boss Rush}> Eruption/Absorption - Guardbreak, Reinforce, and Boss Rush_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/essence-sprinkle-boss-rush.png} tip={Essence Sprinkle Boss Rush}> Essence Sprinkle - Boss Rush_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/dragon-vein-enhance.png} tip={Dragon Vein Enhance}> Dragon Vein - Enhance_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/essence-sprinkle-boost.png} tip={Essence Sprinkle (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/dragon-vein-eruption.png} tip={Dragon Vein Eruption (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/dragon-vein-absorption.png} tip={Dragon Vein Absorption (4th Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/mountain-seeds.png} tip={Mountain Seeds (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/mountain-kid.png} tip={Mountain Kid (1st Job)}> [ <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/wakeup-call.png} tip={Wakeup Call (3rd Job)}> / <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/dragon-vein-traces.png} tip={Dragon Vein Traces (3rd Job)}> ]
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first

For the secondary trio, based on your preferences, the last skill boosted can be either <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/wakeup-call.png} tip={Wakeup Call (3rd Job)}> or <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/dragon-vein-traces.png} tip={Dragon Vein Traces (3rd Job)}>
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/essence-sprinkle-boost.png} tip={Essence Sprinkle (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/mountain-kid.png} tip={Mountain Kid (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/mountain-seeds.png} tip={Mountain Seeds (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/dragon-vein-eruption.png} tip={Dragon Vein Eruption (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/wakeup-call.png} tip={Wakeup Call (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/dragon-vein-traces.png} tip={Dragon Vein Traces (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/dragon-vein-absorption.png} tip={Dragon Vein Absorption (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/vine-coil.png} tip={Vine Coil (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to the members of the Lara Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability + Infographic

extraContent.title: Dragon Vein Reading
extraContent.content:
In 2nd Job, Lara gains access to Dragon Veins that periodically spawn around you and can be interacted with via your skills. Each Dragon Vein will have a special attribute of either River, Wind, or Sun with different effects when activated

Dragon Vein Eruption and Absorption

In 2nd Job, Lara gains Dragon Vein Eruption that is used to interact with Dragon Veins that summons a spirit at the location of the Dragon Vein. In 4th Job, Lara gains Dragon Vein Absorption that consumes a Dragon Vein to empower Essence Sprinkle (1st Job) and Wakeup Call (3rd Job) with the attribute consumed.

When an Eruption skill is active, using an Eruption or Absorption skill of the same attribute will cause the previously activated Eruption skill to end

When an Absorption skill is active, using an Eruption skill of the same attribute will cause the previously activated Absorption skill to end

Manifestation

Lastly, in 3rd Job, Lara gains 3 Manifestation skills that provides some useful utility. Below are the Manifestation skills:

  • Where the River Courses: Creates a reusable 1-way travel from a River Dragon Vein to a nearby specified point
  • Wind Swing: Grants a buff zone that grants +1 Attack Speed for party members
  • Sunlight-Filled Ground: Grants a buff zone that increases %Damage and restores %Max HP for party members

primary.name: Spirit Affinity
primary.shortDesc: Minion Duration +10%

primary.name: Shapeshift
primary.shortDesc: Hide your horns.\nCooldown: 10 sec.
details: This skill is obtained from the Lara storyline

primary.name: To Narin!
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5. Moves you to Narin.\nCooldown: 600 sec.
details: This skill is obtained from the Lara storyline

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete Lara's storyline and the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/242/The_Secret_of_the_Bell} title={"The Secret of the Bell"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Essence Sprinkle
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Damage: 80%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 5
primary.desc: Cast a burst of magic forward

primary.name: Jump for Joy!
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10. Allows you to jump a greater distance.
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Leap Up
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10. Jump higher up.
primary.desc: Vertical jump skill
details: Can be assigned to a Key Slot or activated while on the ground by pressing the Up Key and Jump Key together
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys

primary.name: Mountain Kid
primary.shortDesc: Mountain Spirits have a 40% chance to appear when Essence Sprinkle hits. Damage: 85%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Max Hits: 3, Boss Damage: 105%
primary.desc: Successful attacks with <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/essence-sprinkle.png} tip={Essence Sprinkle (1st Job)}> have a chance to deal an additional attack
details: Deals increased damage to bosses
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Peerless Mountain
primary.shortDesc: Consume 40 MP to reduce damage taken by 70%.

primary.name: Response
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +22, Max Speed: +20, Jump: +20, Max HP: +20%, Defense: +100, Damage Taken: -15%

primary.name: Dragon Vein Reading
primary.shortDesc: Discover Dragon Veins in Lara's surroundings. A max of 10 dragon vein(s) can be found on the map. When moving away from the Dragon Veins, they will disappear, starting with those farthest away.\nCooldown: 5 sec.
primary.desc: Dragon Veins periodically spawn nearby that can be interacted with using Dragon Vein skills
details: Each Dragon Vein will have an attribute of either the river, wind, or sun and will have different effects when activated
Moving too far away will cause Dragon Veins to disappear

primary.name: Dragon Vein Eruption
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Activates an Eruption skill that matches the Dragon Vein's attribute.\nIncreases Damage by 1% per 2% increase in Summons Duration.\nCooldown: 0.30 sec.
primary.desc: Activate an Eruption skill based on the Dragon Vein's attribute
details: Eruption skills summon a spirit to erupt from a Dragon Vein
Activating a new Eruption or Aborption (in 4th Job) skill of the same attribute will cause the previously activated Eruption skill to end
While casting, gain 100% Knockback Resistance
Unaffected by %Summon Duration but instead increases %Damage based on %Summon Duration
Eruption skills are unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Eruption: Heaving River
primary.shortDesc: River Spirit Duration: 16 sec. Surge Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 260%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Surges: 8
primary.desc: Summon a River Spirit that attacks nearby enemies

primary.name: Eruption: Whirlwind
primary.shortDesc: Wind Spirit Duration: 16 sec. Whirlwind Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 90%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 5, Max Whirlwinds: 5
primary.desc: Summon a Wind Spirit that continuously damages enemies in an area

primary.name: Eruption: Sunrise Well
primary.shortDesc: Giant Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 145%, Number of Attacks: 6. After attack, Lava Area Duration: 16, Damage: 110% per 1 sec., Number of Attacks: 1, Max Enemies Hit: 10\nPeriodically creates 4 volcanic bomb(s). Volcanic Bomb Damage: 95%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Volcanic Bombs: 5. If several volcanic bombs hit a single enemy, Final Damage for the second volcanic bomb and onwards: -10%. Damage Over Time for enemies hit by volcanic bombs: 60% damage for 8 sec.
primary.desc: Summon a Sunlight Spirit that explodes and creates a lingering damaging zone
details: The lingering zone will also periodically creates bombs that damage enemies<bp_Enemies hit are applied a damaging debuff_Enemies hit by multiple bombs take reduced %Final Damage after the first bomb_Bombs will prioritize boss monsters starting with the highest HP within the area_>

primary.name: Mountain Seeds
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20. Mountain Spirit Duration: 10 sec., Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 55%, Number of Attacks: 1.\nMax Mountain Spirits on Map: 4\n1 Mountain Seed is recharged every 7 sec., and you can hold up to 4 at a time.
primary.desc: Summon a sprit that attacks nearby enemies and pushes enemies towards any active Eruption skill
details: Gain one Mountain Spirit every 7 secs (up to 4 at a time)
Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together will summon all available spirits at once
Using the skill while casting <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/dragon-vein-eruption.png} tip={Dragon Vein Eruption (2nd Job)}> will cause no cast animation while planting
Right-clicking the skill will toggle Auto Use ON/OFF causing a seed to be planted at the location of a Dragon Vein each time an Eruption skill is used
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Wand Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Increases Magic Attack Speed for 180 sec.
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Wand Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Wand Mastery: +50%\nMagic ATT: +35

primary.name: Fortune Fitness
primary.shortDesc: Intelligence: +40

primary.name: Manifestation: Where the River Courses
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80. Use the skill to designate an end point within 20 sec. River Duration between Start Point and End Point: 90 sec. Press the up arrow key at the start point to travel along the river.\nCooldown: 60 sec.\n[Passive Effect: Heaving River Damage: +120%p]
primary.desc: When used, consume a River Dragon Vein to become a Start Point and can be used again to specify an End Point that can be travelled to
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/eruption-heaving-river.png} tip={Eruption: Heaving River (2nd Job)}> by a flat amount
Press the Up Arrow Key at the Start Point to travel along the river
Two points must be created before travelling along the river<bp_The second point does not need to be a River Dragon Vein_>
Gain 100% Knockback Resistance and can attack while travelling
While travelling, skills can be used to activate nearby Dragon Veins

primary.name: Manifestation: Wind Swing
primary.shortDesc:
Cost: MP 80, Wind Swing Duration: 30 sec.
Area Buff: Attack Speed +1 level, Speed: +20, Jump: +20
Buff Duration for Self: 120 sec, Buff Duration for Party Members: 20 sec.
Press the up arrow key and hold down jump in mid-air within the area of the wind swing to float midair for up to 4.5 sec.
Cooldown: 60 sec.
[Passive Effect: Whirlwind Damage: +35%p]
primary.desc: Convert a Wind Dragon Vein into a zone that increases Attack Speed (by 1 stage), Speed, and Jump to party members within it
details: [Passive]: Increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/eruption-whirlwind.png} tip={Eruption: Whirlwind (2nd Job)}> by a flat amount
Pressing the Up Arrow Key and holding the Jump Key within the buff zone allows you to float briefly<bp_Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF this ability for party members_>
Duration of buff is shorter for party members
Gain 100% Knockback Resistance during casting animation

primary.name: Manifestation: Sunlight-Filled Ground
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80, Sunlight Area Duration: 20 sec., Area Buff: Damage: +25%
Buff Duration on Self: 120 sec., Buff Duration on Party Members: 20 sec.
HP Recovered in Area: 10% of Max HP every 2 sec.
Cooldown: 60 sec.
[Passive Effect: Sunrise Well Damage: +48%p]
primary.desc: Convert a Sun Dragon Vein into a zone that increases %Damage and recovers %Max HP to party members within it
details: [Passive]: Increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/eruption-sunrise-well.png} tip={Eruption: Sunrise Well (2nd Job)}> by a flat amount
Duration of buff is shorter for party members
Gain 100% Knockback Resistance during casting animation

primary.name: Wakeup Call
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30. Creates as many intangible forces as there are enemies. Min Intangible Forces: 7, Max Intangible Forces: 12, Damage: 105% Number of Attacks: 4\nIf several intangible forces hit a single enemy, Final Damage for the second intangible force and onwards: -40%\nCooldown: 9 sec.
primary.desc: Consume a Dragon Vein to create homing missiles that seek out nearby enemies
details: Enemies hit by multiple missiles take reduced %Final Damage after the first missile
A fixed number of missiles are created and increases based on the number of available enemies
Gain 100% Knockback Resistance during casting animation
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Dragon Vein Traces
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 65. Uses 1 Earthly Energy. Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 2\n1 Earthly Energy is recharged every 6 sec., and you can hold up to 4 at a time.\nCooldown: 1 sec.
primary.desc: Teleport to a nearby Dragon Vein and damages nearby enemies around it
details: Uses a special resource called "Earthly Energy"<bp_You gain one Earthly Energy every 6 secs (up to 4 at a time)_>
Prioritizes unactivated Dragon Veins

primary.name: Dragon Vein Echo
primary.shortDesc: When Dragon Veins are consumed, HP Recovered: 1% of Max HP, MP Recovered: 5% of Max MP, Final Damage: +5% for 20 sec.

primary.name: Immaculate Thought
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +20%, Boss Damage: +10%, Critical Rate: +20%\nMax MP: +30%, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Geomancy
primary.shortDesc:
Essence Sprinkle Damage: +50%p
Mountain Kid Damage: +35%p
Mountain Kid Boss Damage: +45%p
Mountain Seed Damage: +75%p

primary.name: Dragon Vein Absorption
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Activates an Absorption skill that matches the Dragon Vein's attribute.\nCooldown: 0.30 sec.
primary.desc: Activate an Absorption skill based on the Dragon Vein's attribute
details: Absorption skills absorbs a Dragon Veins to empower <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/essence-sprinkle.png} tip={Essence Sprinkle (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/wakeup-call.png} tip={Wakeup Call (3rd Job)}><bp_Absorption skills can also be activated by <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/mountain-kid.png} tip={Mountain Kid (1st Job)}> when you have the Inner Ability %Chance to Skip Cooldown_>
When an Absorption skill is active, activating an Eruption skill of the same attribute will cause the previously activated Absorption skill to end
While casting, you gain 100% Knockback Resistance
Eruption skills are unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Absorption: River Puddle Douse
primary.shortDesc: When Essense Sprinkle hits, a River Spirit appears and attacks enemies for 90 sec. Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 510%, Number of Attacks: 10\nCooldown: 2.5 sec.
primary.desc: Successful attacks with <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/essence-sprinkle.png} tip={Essence Sprinkle (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/wakeup-call.png} tip={Wakeup Call (3rd Job)}> causes a River Spirit to appear and damage nearby enemies

primary.name: Absorption: Fierce Wind
primary.shortDesc: When Essense Sprinkle hits, a fierce wind appears on one enemy for 90 sec.\nMax Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 250%, Number of Lasting Attacks: 3\nCooldown: 2.5 sec.
primary.desc: Successful attacks with <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/essence-sprinkle.png} tip={Essence Sprinkle (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/wakeup-call.png} tip={Wakeup Call (3rd Job)}> causes a Wind Spirit to appear and continuously damage nearby enemies

primary.name: Absorption: Sunlit Grain
primary.shortDesc:
When Essense Sprinkle hits, sun land spirits appear and create 5 fireball(s) that pursue and attack enemies for 90 sec.
Damage: 265%, Number of Attacks: 6
When a single enemy is struck by several fireballs, starting with the second fireball, Final Damage: -40%
Cooldown: 2.5 sec.
primary.desc: Successful attacks with <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/essence-sprinkle.png} tip={Essence Sprinkle (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/wakeup-call.png} tip={Wakeup Call (3rd Job)}> causes a Sun Spirit to appear and create fireballs that seek out nearby enemies
details: Enemies hit by multiple fireballs take reduced %Final Damage after the first fireball
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first

primary.name: Dragon Vein Conversion
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Press direction keys within 3 sec of using the skill to convert the target Dragon Vein's attribute into a different attribute.\nCooldown: 1 sec., Increases cooldown by 6 sec when attribute conversion is successful.
primary.desc: Convert the attribute of a Dragon Vein to a different attribute
details: While active, pressing an Arrow Key will change the attribute to the chosen one
While casting, you gain 100% Knockback Resistance

primary.name: Nature Master
primary.shortDesc:
Eruption Skill Duration: +18 sec
Heaving River
Surge Max Monsters Hit: +2, Number of Attacks: +5, Damage: 750%. Periodically creates a big surge with Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 860%, Number of Attacks: 8. Max Surge Count: A normal surge and a big surge, for a total of 9.
Whirlwind
Increases whirlwind range, Max Monsters Hit: +4, Damage: 445%
Sunrise Well
Giant Max Monsters Hit: 4, Damage: 750%. Increases lava area creation range, Lava Area Damage: 420%, Volcanic Bomb Damage: 450%, Damage Over Time for enemies hit with volcanic bombs: 125%. Creates volcanic bombs more frequently, 5 at a time, up to 5 time(s).
details: This version replaces the 2nd Job version and does not receive the passive bonus from 3rd Job Manifestation skills
Increases Eruption Skill Duration (from 16s to 18s)
Each individual upgrade will be described below

primary.name: Nature Master - Heaving River Upgrade
details: Increases %Damage, Number of Hits, and Max Enemies Hit
Periodically a big River Spirit appears, dealing a more powerful attack

primary.name: Nature Master - Whirlwind Upgrade
details: Increases range of attack
Increases %Damage and Max Enemies Hit

primary.name: Nature Master - Sunrise Well Upgrade
details: Increases %Damage of initial attack
Increases the %Damage and size of the lingering zone
Increases the %Damage of the bombs and damaging debuff
Bombs are now created more frequently

primary.name: Best Friend
primary.shortDesc: Increases Essence Sprinkle attack range, MP Cost: 25, Max Enemies Hit: +1, Damage: +340%
details: This version replaces the 1st Job version but receives the passive bonus from <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/geomancy.png} tip={Geomancy (3rd Job)}>
Increases Attack Range, %Damage and Max Enemies Hit of attack

primary.name: Mountain Embrace
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150, Max Key-down Duration: 8, Damage Taken while key is held, including attacks that deal damage in proportion to Max HP: -55%\nReduces cooldown by 3.5. for every 1 sec of the remaining key-down time after the skill ends.\nCooldown: 60 sec.
primary.desc: While held, reduces damage taken including %Max HP attacks
details: Based on how long the skill was held, the cooldown will be shorter
Unaffected by cooldown resets and Critical Abnormal Statuses

primary.name: Anima Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Grandis Goddess appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Anima Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Advanced Wand Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Wand Mastery: +70%\nFinal Damage: +30%, Magic ATT: +50, Attack Speed: +1
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Additionally, increases %Final Damage, Attack Speed (by 1 stage) and grants flat Magic Attack

primary.name: In-depth Geomancy
primary.shortDesc:
Mountain Kid Appearance Rate: +70%, Increases Mountain Kid attack range
Mountain Kid Damage: +208%p, Boss Monster Damage: +260%p
Mountain Seed Damage: +265%p, Mountain Seed Duration: +20 sec
Wakeup Call Damage: +95%p
Dragon Vein Traces Damage: +55%p

primary.name: Insight
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +20%, Final Damage: +45%, Monster Def Ignored: +40%

primary.name: Relaxation
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +50, Status Resistance: +30, All Elemental Resistance: +30%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

hyperPassive.name: Eruption/Absorption - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of Eruption and Absorption skills

hyperPassive.name: Eruption/Absorption - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of Eruption and Absorption skills

hyperPassive.name: Eruption/Absorption - Boss Rush
details: Increases %Boss Damage of Eruption and Absorption skills

hyperPassive.name: Dragon Vein Echo - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: While Dragon Vein Echo is active, Speed: +30, Jump: +20, Recovers 3% of Max HP every 5 sec

hyperPassive.name: Mountain Embrace - Extra Shield
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Create a shield equal to 15% of Max HP every 1 sec while Mountain Embrace is active. The shield disappears 1 sec after Mountain Embrace ends.

hyperPassive.name: Dragon Vein - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Will not be knocked back by any attack while casting skills that consume Dragon Veins.

hyperActive.name: Unconstrained Dragon Vein
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500. Create an unconstrained Dragon Vein in front of you. Use Dragon Vein Eruption or Dragon Vein Absorption on the unconstrained Dragon Vein to select your preferred attribute within 2 sec.
Max Unconstrained Dragon Veins on Map: 3
1 unconstrained Dragon Vein is recharged every 10 sec., and you can maintain up to 3 at a time.
Cooldown: 1.50 sec
hyperActive.desc: Spawn a Dragon Vein that can be assigned an attribute by using Eruption, Absorption, or Manifestation skills
details: Gain one unconstrained Dragon Vein every 10 secs (up to 3 at a time)
Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together spawns all ready Dragon Veins at once
While casting, you gain 100% Knockback Resistance
Unaffected by cooldown resets

hyperActive.name: Vine Coil
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks: 6
Stun Duration for Attacked Enemies: 10 sec
Stun Duration: +100%, depending on damage inflicted with Vine Coil.
Cooldown: 180 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Release an attack that binds nearby enemies hit

hyperActive.name: Arbor Away
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, Tree Duration: 30 sec.
Monster Defense when in the tree's area: -15% for remaining Tree Duration
When Lara is in the tree's area, Knockback Resistance: +100%, Boss Damage: +30%, Critical Damage: +10%
Clears Lara's Abnormal Status every 2 sec.
Cooldown: 180 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Summon a tree that grants a buff while you are within it and debuffs enemies within it
details: [Buff]: Increases Lara's Knockback Resistance, Boss Damage, and Crit Damage<bp_Also periodically clears Abnormal Statuses_>
[Debuff]: Reduces %Enemy DEF<bp_Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF_>
Unaffected by cooldown resets

fifthMain.name: Big Stretch
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500. Awaken 4 Dragon Vein(s) within a certain range around another Dragon Vein.
Each awakened Dragon Vein creates 7 intangible force(s). Intangible Force Damage: 2420%, Number of Attacks: 5
If several intangible forces hit a single enemy, Final Damage for the second force and onwards: -30%
Cooldown: 60 sec. Cooldown if awakened Dragon Vein count is less than the max number that can be awakened: -12 sec for each Dragon Vein that could be awakened
fifthMain.desc: Consumes nearby Dragon Veins to create homing missiles that seek out nearby enemies
details: Enemies hit by multiple missiles take reduced %Final Damage after the first missile
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
While casting, gain 100% Knockback Resistance
Cooldown is reduced for each Dragon Vein remaining if less than the max number is consumed
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Land's Connection
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1200, Land spirits appear in the order of Mountain, River, Wind, and Sunlight, shocking enemies with 2310% Damage 3 time(s). Number of Attacks: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 10. Afterwards, activates explosion with 3080% Damage 15 time(s), Number of Attacks: 7, Max Enemies Hit: 10.\nCooldown: 180 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Unleash a massive barrage of attacks and finish with a final explosion
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Surging Essence
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Shock enemies with 1870% Damage 6 time(s), Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 10\nCooldown: 20 sec.
fifthMain.desc: An Earth Spirit appears in front of you that damages nearby enemies

fifthMain.name: Winding Mountain Ridge
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500. Summons 3 group(s) of Mountain Spirits within a certain range. Once summoned, they periodically run at enemies to attack. Group Summon Duration: 30 sec. Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 1100%, Number of Attacks: 4. Running into enemies decreases running speed. Max Number of Attacks: 20 per group\nCooldown: 60 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Summon several Earth Spirits nearby that travels back and forth damaging enemies in its path
details: If there are enemies nearby, the Earth Spirit will chase towards it, prioritizing boss monsters
Can only be summoned if there is a platform nearby
The Earth Spirit slows down if it collides with an enemy
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthBoost.name: Essence Sprinkle Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Wakeup Call Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Damage Against Normal Enemies: +10%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Mountain Kid Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Damage Against Normal Enemies: +10%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Mountain Seeds Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Dragon Vein Eruption Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Dragon Vein Absorption Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Damage Against Normal Enemies: +10%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Vine Coil Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Damage Against Normal Enemies: +10%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/essence-sprinkle.png} tip={Essence Sprinkle (1st Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Essence Sprinkle
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 840%, Number of Attacks: 4\n[Passive Effects - Mountain Kid and Mountain Seeds Damage: +660% points]
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/anima/lara/dragon-vein-eruption.png} tip={Dragon Vein Eruption (2nd Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Dragon Vein Eruption
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 60, Activates an Eruption skill that matches the Dragon Vein's attribute.
Increases Damage by 1% per 2% increase in Summons Duration.
Cooldown: 0.3 sec.
[Passive Effect: Absorption Skill Final Damage: +21%]
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Eruption: Heaving River
masteryCore.shortDesc: River Spirit Duration: 18 sec\nSurge Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1110%, Number of Attacks: 5, Large Surge Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1320%, Number of Attacks: 8\nRegular and Large Surges Triggered: 9
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Eruption: Whirlwind
masteryCore.shortDesc: Wind Spirit Duration: 18 sec\nWhirlwind Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 690%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 5, Max Whirlwinds: 5
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Eruption: Sunrise Well
masteryCore.shortDesc:
Giant Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1060%, Number of Attacks: 6
After attack, Lava Area Duration: 18 sec
Damage: 600% per 1 sec, Number of Attacks: 1, Max Enemies Hit: 10
Periodically creates 5 volcanic bomb(s), Volcanic Bomb Damage: 675%, Number of Attacks: 3
Max Volcanic Bombs: 5, If several volcanic bombs hit a single enemy, Final Damage for the second volcanic bomb and onwards: -10%.
Damage Over Time for enemies hit by volcanic bombs: 195% damage for 8 sec.
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Universe in Bloom
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1500, invincible during casting
Nature spirits gather: Number of Flowers: 8, Max enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 2100%, Number of Attacks: 7
The flowers bloom: Vein Energy Release: 64, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1385%, Number of Attacks: 14
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Lara is an INT mage class part of the Anima class group. Lara uses Dragon Veins that periodically spawn in your surroundings that can be interacted with using your skills. Each Dragon Vein will have a special attribute of either River, Wind, or Sun with different effects when activated
